title: description
All4One's Three Swear: An aged variant of the Three Stripes. As worn as All4One's flow.

title: notes
All4One's Three Swear: Gin, Dry Vermouth and a hint of party.

title: pairing
All4One's Three Swear: All4One has it with an aged French string beans and shortcake.

title: serving_suggestion
All4One's Three Swear: Muddle several orange slices in mixing glass (optional). Drink to the tender sounds of I Swear.
